医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
新的靶向疗法可能会使地衣平面的人缓解梅奥诊所的研究人员已经确定了一种有针对性的疗法，可以使患有地衣planus的患者缓解皮肤，头发，指甲，嘴和生殖器的慢性炎症皮肤状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/new-targeted-therapy-therapy-could-bring-relief-to-peeople-with-lichen-planus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/new-targeted-therapy-therapy-could-bring-relief-to-peeople-with-lichen-planus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e252f780-c4e7-408f-8cdb-532d151d1858 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 13:23:50 -0500 New targeted therapy could bring relief to people with lichen planus
每天一克omega-3可能会降低生物衰老的速度一项临床试验表明，omega-3，维生素D和运动可以减缓生物衰老，联合干预措施显示对健康的影响最强。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/one-gram-of-omga-3-per-per-per-per-may-slow-down-down-the-rate-the-rate-trate-fate-fibiological-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/One-gram-of-emega-3-per-per-day-may-slow-down-down-the-rate-the-rate-of-biological-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ec90fc0-9972-4f00-8ea7-eea7-ea64f43c12a Mon, 03 Feb 2025 12:32:00 -0500 One gram of omega-3 per day may slow down the rate of biological aging
肥胖药物的处方趋势激增，与GLP-1药物的兴趣日益增加有关由于公共利益影响处方趋势，因此肥胖药物处方达到了150万次，这是GLP-1代理和Tirzepatide的驱动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/prescription-rend-trends-for-obesity-medications-surge-surge-surge-to to-nid-Interest-Interest-interest-In-in-Glp-1-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/prescription-trends-for-obesity-medications-medications-surge-surge-to-to-to-in-to-inter-inte-interest-interest-interest-interestin-glp-1-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e94b9f08-8ad1-45c1-45c1-adcb-54276e7fbc63 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 12:22:00 -0500 Prescription trends for obesity medications surge, tied to growing interest in GLP-1 drugs
新化合物显示有望用蓝光激活治疗牛皮癣牛皮癣是一种慢性皮肤疾病，主要表现出皮肤症状（干燥，瘙痒，鳞状皮肤，异常斑块和斑块）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/new-compound-shows-promise-promise-formise-foreating-psoriasis-with-blue-light-activation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/new-compound-shows-promise-promise-formise-foreating-psoriasis-with-blue-light-light-activation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe209751-A04D-4D48-9D02-F98553A913DE Mon, 03 Feb 2025 10:55:00 -0500 New compound shows promise for treating psoriasis with blue light activation
Lurie儿童发射运动，以提高人们对新生儿筛查的认识Ann＆Robert H. Lurie儿童医院芝加哥发起了一项新生儿筛查宣传运动，芝加哥各地的公共交通和广告牌上的标牌敦促父母立即与孩子的儿科医生联系，如果结果超出正常范围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/lurie-childrens-launches-campaignes-campaign--campaign-to-raise-aise-aise-aise-aise-aist--newborn-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/lurie-childrens-launches-campaignes-campaign-campaign-to-raise-aise-evareness-of-newborn-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99c5ca09c5ca09-2f2f-4478-9276-59F25B984EA6 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 10:49:09 -0500 Lurie Children's launches campaign to raise awareness of newborn screening
大流行期间与酒精有关的死亡和住院治疗显着增加根据CMAJ（加拿大医学协会杂志）https://www.cmaj.ca/lookup/lookup/doi/10.1503/1503/cmaj.241146，大流行期间与酒精有关的死亡人数增加了18％，与酒精使用有关的住院治疗也增加了18％。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/alcohol-realated-deaths-and-hospitalizations-sincrigation-scrigation-scrigantimbility-scrigantiver-digry-digry-digry-digry-digry-digry-digry-digry-digry-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/alcohol-realated-deaths-and-hospitalizations-incred-signcred-signifunder-sigrigation-digry-distiver-distiver-distiver-distiment-distiment-distiment-distriging-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28135411-4b4e-4186-bef5-81b4555d4368b Mon, 03 Feb 2025 09:53:38 -0500 Alcohol-related deaths and hospitalizations increased significantly during pandemic
研究发现双胞胎母亲的心血管疾病风险增加根据今天（星期一）发表在《欧洲心脏》杂志上的研究（星期一），双胞胎母亲出生后的一年，双胞胎母亲出生后一年就被送往医院的风险是两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/study-finds-increased-risk-risk-of-cardioseases-disease-disease-for-twins.aspx.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/study-finds-increased-risk-risk-of-cardioseasease-disease-for-mothers-mothers-mothers-mothers-mothers-twins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87E808F5-9D7E-47A7A7-9388-ACDF3B089ED5 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 09:44:29 -0500 Study finds increased risk of cardiovascular disease for mothers of twins
阿尔茨海默氏病与脑充氧和神经元功能有关兰开斯特大学（Lancaster University）领导的研究表明，明确的证据表明，阿尔茨海默氏病中脑氧合动力学和神经元功能的编排变化有助于神经变性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/alzheimers-disease-linked-to to-dimested-brain-brain-oxygenation-and-gengegenation-and-neuronal-finction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/alzheimers-disease-linked-to-dimested-brain-brain-oxygenation-and-gengenation-and-neuronal-finction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=212fb8d5-4800-4800-46cc-b7f5-e06f69304753 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 09:38:22 -0500 Alzheimer's disease linked to disrupted brain oxygenation and neuronal function
研究人员开发了识别肺癌患者中抗肿瘤免疫细胞的模型约翰·霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心和彭博〜Kimmel癌症免疫疗法研究所的研究人员开发了一种计算机模型，以帮助科学家鉴定受到免疫检查点抑制剂治疗的肺癌患者的抗肿瘤免疫细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/researchers-develop-model-to-sendify-tumor-tumor-fighting-mmmune-cells-inlung-cancer-cancer-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/researchers-develop-model-to-model-to-sendify-tumor-fighting-mmmune-cells-in-rung-cancer-cancer-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d627f9b-5334-4545-A28F-23D56854EBF8 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 09:28:29 -0500 Researchers develop model to identify tumor-fighting immune cells in lung cancer patients
研究揭示了癌症治疗中CAR分子转移背后的机制使用称为CAR-T细胞的工程免疫细胞用于治疗癌症。乌普萨拉大学的研究人员现在发现，在肿瘤微环境中，可以将CAR分子从CAR-T细胞转移到其他T细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/study-reveals-mechanism-behind-behind-car-molecule-molecule-transfer-transfer-incancer-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/study-reveals-mechanism-behind-car-molecule-molecule-molecule-transfer-transfer-incancer-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf75df33-a11f-4f6b-aefa-cb3c67699baf2 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 09:21:24 -0500 Study reveals mechanism behind car molecule transfer in cancer therapy
